text: Peddle is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Ambrose Peddle (1927–2014), Canadian politician * Chuck Peddle (1937–2019), American computer hardware engineer * Julian Peddle (born 1955), English entrepreneur * Juliet Peddle (1899–1979), American architect * Geoff Peddle (born 1963), Anglican bishop * Mark Peddle ( 21st century), Canadian musician
title: Peddle (surname)
